Selfish Withholding Recorded 

     God reads the covetous thought in every heart that purposes to withhold from Him. Those who are selfishly 
                                                                           88
neglectful in paying their tithes, and bringing their gifts and offerings to the treasury, God sees. The Lord Jehovah understands it all. As a book of remembrance is written before Him of them that fear the Lord, and that think upon His name, so there is a record kept of all who are appropriating to themselves the gifts which God entrusted to them to use for the salvation of souls.--R. & H., May 16, 1893.
